FrageText.de: Worauf weist Sie dieses Verkehrszeichen hin?
FrageText.en: What does this road sign refer to?
FrageText.hr: Na što upućuje ovaj prometni znak?
FrageText.tr: Bu trafik işareti size neyi bildiriyor?

en.Text: At the access of a post office
Only parking on the right is permitted

sl.Text: Parkiranje dovoljeno samo na desni strani
